member.name: Sagar Stark
member.description: Sagar has over 10 years of experience in the hospitality industry and has been with our hostel since it opened. He oversees all operations and ensures that our guests have a comfortable and enjoyable stay.

member.name: Jane Smith
member.description: Jane is the friendly face you'll see when you check in at our hostel. She's been with us for 5 years and knows all the best local spots to visit during your stay.

member.name: Mark Johnson
member.description: Mark ensures that our rooms are always clean and comfortable for our guests. He has been with us for 3 years and takes pride in providing excellent service to all our guests.

member.name: Sarah Lee
member.description: Sarah is in charge of our hostel's kitchen, and she takes pride in creating delicious and healthy meals for our guests. She has been a chef for over 15 years and has worked in some of the best restaurants in the city.
